author: TravisEz13
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

I filed this issue to fix the image, so these steps might not work in the future:  https://github.com/Microsoft/vsts-agent-docker/issues/93
```powershell
docker run -it microsoft/vsts-agent /usr/bin/pwsh
# running as root at this point
update-help
get-help about_variables
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
show variable help
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
get-help : Get-Help could not find about_variables in a help file in this session. To download updated help topics type: "Update-Help". To get help online, search for the help topic in the TechNet library at https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=107116.                                At line:1 char:1                                                                                                                                + get-help about_variablesx                                                                                                                     + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~                                                                                                                     + CategoryInfo          : ResourceUnavailable: (:) [Get-Help], HelpNotFoundException                                                            + FullyQualifiedErrorId : HelpNotFound,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetHelpCommand          
```

title: Update-Help should default to english if not culture is set on linux
